nodes.text: 3464 was a B1-series battle droid in the Geonosian droid army who served in the Petranaki Arena during the First Battle of Geonosis. The battle droid confronted Jedi Sar Labooda during the battle, but she cut at his arms using her lightsaber.

3464 first appeared in the 2002 film Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones, the second installment of the Star Wars prequel trilogy. While the droid's designation number can be seen via his comlink booster pack, it could only be translated after Star Wars: The Complete Visual Dictionary, New Edition gave a key for B1 numerals.
